input.sentences: every surface was laid out in light .
candles formed paths along the ground .
they led to the center of the festival area .
the highlight was seeing the pagoda lit up beautifully .
output.sentences: The Wass is a spectacular festival
They laid lights on the surface of the ground

the led lights directed us to the festival center
Seeing the pagoda lit up was the highlight
